Sequence Information.Peptide Name: gamma1-purothionin (gamma1-P, Greek puro=wheat,defensin, 4S=S, UCSS1a;  natural, Plants, DXWZ)
Sequence Information.Source: wheat endosperm,Triticum turgidumL cv Senatore Capelli

Literature Information.Literature: Solution structure was determined by NMR (Bruix M et al., 1993). It has a well-defined triple-stranded antiparallel beta-sheet (residues 1-6, 31-34, and 39-47), an alpha-helix (residues 16-28), and the corresponding connecting loops. Updated 7/2016.
Literature Information.Author: Colilla FJ, Rocher A, Mensez E1990
Literature Information.Title: Gamma-purothionins: amino acid sequence of two polypeptides of a new family of thionins from wheat endosperm
